Task 5 (6 Marks)

Suggested Time for Task 5: 10 minutes

You want to order lunch for the meeting.

Read the text from your manager below.

a) Complete the online form.

Lunch Order Form
Order Details
Customer Name & Contact Number (1 mark)
Date and Time for Collection (1 mark)
Set Menu 1 or 2 (1 mark)
Number of People (1 mark)

Terms and Conditions

All orders must be paid for in full at the time of collection.

Put an X in the box to accept the terms and conditions. (1 mark)

b) Please re-enter the Captcha code, exactly as shown, to submit the form. (1 mark)

When you have finished Task 5 press Next.
